title: Pi-network314159
author: Pi-network314159
content: I greet ona o. I just dey reason how many coin don surface for air after bitcoin. So many of them don fall finish. If you go coingecho or any crypto website, you go see say na everyday coin dey enter market and naso them get short life spam. People wey never know wetting the happen go dey buy am dey Happy say there future don bright not knowing say na junk then they buy. Tera Luna and FTT coin show people shegge and other ones wey I no no. Now people come dey realise say na bitcoin be the Koko. So I come they think wether na these things wey happen to people naim increase bitcoin adoption pass the way e been dey before or bitcoin for just grow without these things wey I talk. Abeg make ona shear ona idea on wetting ona think dey increase bitcoin adoption

comments.body: Wetin dey increase bitcoin adoption na the trust wey people don get on it as them don hodl bitcoin from beginning till now making like 13/14 years thereabout wey dem launch am. So people don hodl am after e drop e go still rise and keep increasing beating previous ATH That confirm bitcoin as store of value, decentralized and deflationary, not affected by inflation.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Bitcoin had proven to the world that it has come to stay due the potentials that it has displayed since it was created. So many people are adopting bitcoin because of its decentralized nature, use as a store of value, hedge against inflation. It one thing that is making people adopting bitcoin currently is because they see it as an asset that they can invest in to make profit from it. Altcoins are shitcoins and were created to fraud people of their hard earned money by the hype. So many people have come to understand and see the unique nature of bitcoin and the benefits attached to it that is why most people prefer bitcoin to altcoin. The only people that will know about bitcoin and leave it for altcoins are greedy people who think that they can make 100x profit from altcoins. But at the end they were disappointed on their decisions. Say no to altcoins and embrace the original, which is bitcoin.

comments.body: My brother bitcoin na king it has been tested and trusted and people come see say na original something be this. And the adoption will keep increasing every year. Sometimes watin dey make some people invest in some shitcoins is that they see bitcoin say the price don too dey high for them to invest their $10, $20, $50, or $100. Them dey reason am say if them put that kind money for Bitcoin say them no go make better money from the investment even if bitcoin beat it’s previous ATH. But they come dey imagine say if they had invested in some shitcoins wey come do 100x with that their small capital say them go make am sharp sharp. That’s why you go see people dey invest in some alt coins without doing proper research about that particular alt coin first. Some benefited while majority loss their investments. comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Bitcoin adoption increases because it is one of the oldest and first cryptocurrency that is very successful and also upon which other cryptocurrency is able to live. It's the lifeline of cryptocurrency, and so many people know that if there is no Bitcoin today, it will be very difficult for cryptocurrency to do well again. While I was investing in altcoins, I lost my money many times because of failed projects, and that was the reason why I just decided to only be focused on accumulating bitcoin, and I believe this is also a reason why Bitcoin adoption is dominating. Investors know that Bitcoin does not have a pump and dump mechanism like altcoins, which makes them feel more safe.
